task_description: Research and recommend travel-friendly PC peripherals for systematic trading workflow
deliverables: 3 travel mouse recommendations with comparison table
Voice input solution analysis (Dragon Professional vs Windows Voice Typing)
3 USB-C headset recommendations with comparison table

progress.update: Agent created, beginning research on travel mice
Research completed on all three categories with comprehensive analysis

findings.top_mouse_recommendation: Logitech MX Anywhere 3S ($85) - Best overall for productivity and travel
findings.top_voice_input_recommendation: Dragon Professional Individual 16 ($300) - Superior for technical trading vocabulary
findings.top_headset_recommendation: Jabra Evolve2 85 ($478) - Best microphone quality for dictation
findings.key_insight_voice: Dragon Professional justified for systematic trading terminology - custom vocabulary support critical
findings.key_insight_headset: Boom microphone design (Jabra) significantly better for dictation than earpiece mics
